title: Michigan Teen Pleads Guilty to Murder, Says Gun ‘Was Not Locked’
description: His parents are charged with involuntary manslaughter in the shooting last year at a high school in Oxford, Mich., that killed four teenagers.
dc:creator: Stephanie Saul
category: Oxford High School (Oxford Charter Township, Mich)
media:credit: Sarah Rice for The New York Times
media:description: A memorial to the victims of the Oxford High School shooting in Centennial Park in Oxford, Mich. last December.
